page.title: 07Yaxham Jubilee Park
page.content: Between 1977 and 1980 the Yaxham community headed by an Amenites Committee raised enough money to buy a playing-field near the church.Katie Glass from Anglia Televison opened the village playing- field known as Jubilee park in 1980.Among the recreational equipment is a climbing frame,and a see-saw. At the entrance to the Park are a fine pair of wrought iron gates with the name "Jubilee Park" written on them. Events held in the village include a carnival,jumble sale,car treasure hunts,fifty-fifty auctions and dog shows;some of these are held in the park. Next to the Park is the Church Room, now used daily by the community for activities ranging from the Children's Playgroup to Bingo.
